agent.hostname.description: Hostname of the agent reporting the event.

agent.module.name.description: Name of the module that collected the event data.

agent.module.type.description: Type of the module used to collect the event data (e.g., auditd, filebeat).

agent.name.description: Name of the agent (e.g., Filebeat, Metricbeat).

alert.created.description: Timestamp when the alert was created.

client.address.description: (Alias for source or client IP address) IP address of the client initiating connection/request.

client.domain.description: Domain name associated with the client.

client.port.description: Port number used by the client.

client.user.id.description: Unique identifier for the client user.

cloud.machine.type.description: Type of machine in the cloud environment.

cloud.provider.description: Name of the cloud provider (e.g., aws, gcp, azure).

cloud.region.description: Cloud provider region where the resource is located.

destination.address.description: Address of the destination of the network traffic or event.

destination.bytes.description: Number of bytes transferred to the destination.

destination.group.description: Security group or user group associated with the destination.

destination.locality.description: Locality or physical location of the destination.

destination.mac.description: MAC address of the destination device.

destination.nat.ip.description: NAT IP address for destination, if applicable.

destination.packets.description: Number of packets sent to the destination.

destination.registered_domain.description: Registered domain name of the destination.

destination.service.name.description: Name of the service at the destination.

destination.software.original.description: Original software name running on the destination.

destination.user.domain.description: Domain of the user at the destination.

destination.user.email.description: Email address of the destination user.

destination.user.group.id.description: Identifier for the destination user group.

destination.user.group.name.description: Name of the destination user group.

destination.user.id.description: Unique ID of the destination user.

event.action.description: Type of action associated with the event (e.g., 'opened', 'deleted').

event.category.description: Category or categories of the event (e.g., 'network', 'authentication').

event.code.description: Numeric code associated with the event.

event.created.description: Timestamp when the event was created.

event.dataset.description: Dataset or source of the event data.

event.duration.description: Duration of the event in milliseconds or other units.

event.ingested.description: Timestamp when the event was ingested into the system.

event.name.description: Name or title of the event.

event.original.description: Original raw event data as received.

event.provider.description: Provider or source of the event data.

event.reason.description: Reason or explanation for the event.

event.reference.description: Reference links or IDs related to the event.

event.result.description: Result of the event or operation.

event.risk_score.description: Risk score associated with the event.

event.sequence.description: Sequence number to order events in a sequence.

event.type.description: Type or types categorizing the event (e.g., 'info', 'error').

event.uuid.description: Unique universal identifier of the event.

event.version.description: Version of the event or schema.

file.accessed.description: File system timestamp for when the file was last accessed.

file.code_signature.publisher.description: Publisher of the digital code signature.

file.code_signature.signed.description: Whether the file is signed digitally.

file.code_signature.subject_name.description: Subject name in the code signature.

file.code_signature.trusted.description: Whether the code signature is trusted.

file.code_signature.valid.description: Validity status of the code signature.

file.comment.description: Comment or description about the file.

file.ctime.description: File creation/change timestamp at the filesystem level.

file.description.description: Description of the file contents or purpose.

file.hash.hashes.description: Hashes of the file in various algorithms.

file.pe.original_file_name.description: Original file name from PE metadata.

file.size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

file.x509.description: x509 certificate information relating to the file.

geo.city_name.description: Name of the city related to the geo location.

geo.continent_code.description: Code of the continent (e.g., 'NA' for North America).

geo.name.description: Name or label for the location.

geo.region_iso_code.description: ISO code for the region or state.

geo.region_name.description: Name of the region or state.

host.asset_id.description: Identifier of the host asset in inventory/service management.

host.description.description: Description or additional info about the host.

host.domain.description: Domain name the host belongs to.

host.ip.description: IP address assigned to the host.

host.mac.description: MAC address of the host network interface.

host.os.name.description: Operating system name of the host.

network.application.description: Name of the network application protocol.

network.bytes.description: Total bytes transferred on the network.

network.community_id.description: Community identifier used for network tracking.

network.ip.version.description: IP version (e.g., '4' for IPv4, '6' for IPv6).

observer.as.number.description: Autonomous System (AS) number of the observer.

observer.as.organization.name.description: Name of the organization owning the AS of the observer.

observer.geo.city_name.description: City name of the observer location.

observer.geo.region_name.description: Name of the region for the observer.

observer.ingress.interface.name.description: Name of the ingress network interface on observer.

observer.os.version.description: OS version of the observer system.

observer.product.description: Product name of the observer system.

observer.serial_number.description: Serial number of the observer hardware.

observer.type.description: Type of the observer (e.g., sensor, router).

process.command_line.description: Full command line of the process.

process.end.description: Timestamp or time when the process ended.

process.entity_id.description: Unique identifier of the process instance/entity.

process.executable.description: Path or name of the executable file of the process.

process.exit_code.description: Exit code returned when the process ended.

process.hash.imphash.description: Import hash related to the process executable.

process.hash.md5.description: MD5 hash of the process executable.

process.hash.sha1.description: SHA1 hash of the process executable.

process.hash.sha256.description: SHA256 hash of the process executable.

process.integrity_level.description: Integrity level of the process (e.g., low, medium, high).

process.parent.args.description: Command-line arguments of the parent process.

process.parent.command_line.description: Full command line of the parent process.

process.parent.entity_id.description: Unique identifier for the parent process.

process.parent.executable.description: Executable file path/name of the parent process.

process.parent.hash.md5.description: MD5 hash of the parent process executable.

process.parent.hash.sha1.description: SHA1 hash of the parent process executable.

process.parent.hash.sha256.description: SHA256 hash of the parent process executable.

process.parent.pid.description: Process ID of the parent process.

process.parent.start.description: Start time of the parent process.

process.path.description: Path of the executable for the process.

process.pe.original_file_name.description: Original file name in PE metadata.

process.title.description: Title of the process or window.

process.tty.description: TTY or terminal associated with the process.

process.user.domain.description: Domain of the user who owned the process.

process.user.name.description: Username of the user who owned the process.

process.working_directory.description: Working directory at the time the process started.

related.hashes.description: Array of hashes related to the event.

related.hosts.description: Array of related hostnames or host IDs.

rule.action.description: Action taken by the detection or rule (e.g., allow, block).

rule.category.description: Category of the detection or rule (e.g., 'malware', 'bruteforce').

rule.policy.description: Policy name the rule belongs to.

rule.reference.description: External references linked to the rule.

rule.ruleset.description: Collection or ruleset the rule belongs to.

server.ip.description: IP address assigned to the server.

server.nat.ip.description: NAT IP used by the server.

server.nat.port.description: NAT port used by the server.

service.address.description: Address of the service (could be IP or hostname).

service.port.description: Network port used by the service.

service.state.description: Current state of the service (e.g., running, stopped).

service.type.description: Type of the service (e.g., web, database).

source.address.description: Address of the source of the network traffic or event.

source.bytes.description: Number of bytes transferred from the source.

source.domain.description: Domain name associated with the source.

source.mac.description: MAC address of the source device.

source.nat.ip.description: NAT IP address for source, if applicable.

source.packets.description: Number of packets sent from source.

source.registered_domain.description: Registered domain name of the source.

source.service.name.description: Name of the service on source.

source.software.original.description: Original software name running on the source device.

source.user.domain.description: Domain name of the source user.

source.user.email.description: Email address of the source user.

source.user.group.name.description: Group name of the source user.

source.user.id.description: Unique identifier for the source user.

source.user.mac.description: MAC address of the source user.

source.user.roles.description: Roles or privileges assigned to the source user.

tls.cipher.description: TLS cipher used in the connection.

tls.client.issuer.description: Distinguished name of the client's certificate issuer.

tls.client.ja3.description: JA3 fingerprint of the TLS client.

tls.client.server_name.description: Server Name Indication (SNI) from TLS client.

tls.server.ja3s.description: JA3S fingerprint of the TLS server.

tls.server.x509.subject_common_name.description: Common Name (CN) from the TLS server's x509 certificate subject.

tls.version.description: Version of the TLS protocol used (e.g., TLS 1.2).

uri.original.description: Original URI captured in the event.

url.extension.description: File extension from the URL path.

url.port.description: Port number referenced in the URL.

url.scheme.description: URL scheme or protocol (e.g., http, https).

url.subdomain.description: Subdomain part of the URL domain.

user.agent.description: User-agent string of the client browser or application.

user.effective.domain.description: Effective domain of the user (in case of impersonation or delegation).

user.effective.group.id.description: Effective group ID of the user.

user.effective.id.description: Effective user ID when impersonation is involved.

user.group.email.description: Array of email addresses of groups the user belongs to.

user.group.id.description: Array of group IDs associated with the user.

user_agent.name.description: Name of the user agent (browser or application).
